1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Bakr that:She was told that 'Aishah said: "The Messenger of Allah said concerning a woman who sees that which causes her doubt (i.e. some bleeding) after she becomes pure: 'That is a vein or veins.'" (Da'if)"What was meant by 'after becomes pure' is after having a bath (following the end of her period)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحَائِضِ تَرَى بَعْدَ الطُّهْرِ الصُّفْرَةَ وَالْكُدْرَةَ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning what a woman sees of yellowish or brownish discharge after becoming pure (of menstruation)
